name: Block Painter
description:
This game was created in a couple of hours because i was bored and wanted to :)

the controls are space to skip initial screen, k to erase everything and up/down arrow keys to change block. Tip: If you placed a block by accident, you can paint over it with another block! this also means layering. If i will see people are interested in this game then I would add more blocks! comment what blocks you will want and I will try to include them!

Music credits:

"Air Hockey Saloon" by Chris Zabriskie https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
